titles.title: Leveraging Efficiency Awareness for Pumping Systems Act
Leveraging Efficiency Awareness for Pumping Systems Act

To require the Secretary of Agriculture to provide information and education tools to farmers on the cost savings, energy savings, water conservation, and carbon emissions reductions that can be realized through the use of energy-efficient pumping systems, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development
